metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12426 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers and community members reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 77. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 78.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '78.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
